entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -7.0°C

Observed at: Wawa Airport 12:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
